Andrew Thresher

Seattle, Washington

I'm a full-stack Software Engineer currently based in Seattle, Washington, with experience in JavaScript/Node.js, React, Ruby, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker, and Go.

Most recently, I built Constellation, an open-source, serverless, framework that simplifies geographically distributed API load testing.

Geo-distributed load testing - simplified

Constellation automates deployment of a load generation system capable of simulating real user traffic from around the world.
